name: Storm Spirit
title: Raijin Thunderkeg
lore: A jolly spirit of lightning, Storm zips across the battlefield with electric energy.

staticRemnant.name: Static Remnant
staticRemnant.description: Creates an electric clone that explodes when enemies come near.

electricVortex.name: Electric Vortex
electricVortex.description: Pulls an enemy towards Storm Spirit.

overload.name: Overload
overload.description: After casting a spell, Storm's next attack deals bonus damage and slows.

ballLightning.name: Ball Lightning
ballLightning.description: Storm transforms into lightning, becoming invulnerable while traveling and dealing damage.

25: Electric Vortex Pulls All Enemies in Range
